aka: The Wide Eyed Girl and The Long Legged Boy

cast.name: 伊沃·卡内拉斯 Ivo Canelas

this_title: A Rapariga de Olhos Grandes e o Rapaz de Pernas Compridas
trans_title: The Wide Eyed Girl and The Long Legged Boy
introduction: Filled with mythical beings and a sense of deep longing, this stop-motion is a love story full of encounters and mismatches, in which resides a constant presence of an incessant search for the relationships of happiness and self- esteem between the two characters.
chinese_title: A Rapariga de Olhos Grandes e o Rapaz de Pernas Compridas
